last_episode_to_air.name: How to Achieve Your Limitless Potential
last_episode_to_air.overview: Open your mind. Andy explores why the possibilities are limitless with a consistent mindfulness practice and leads a resting awareness meditation.

name: Headspace Guide to Meditation
overview: The series shows how meditation can help in your daily life. From tackling stress to embracing gratitude, each episode first teaches the basics and techniques of the practice, and then concludes with a guided meditation. Push play, close your eyes, and explore the many benefits of meditation.
tagline: It's time to be kind to your mind.

episodes.name: How to Get Started
episodes.overview: What is meditation? Begin your journey toward a calmer, clearer mind by learning the basics and try a guided meditation that focuses on the breath.

episodes.name: How to Let Go
episodes.overview: Drop that baggage — and let go of anger, frustration and longing. This effortless guided meditation takes an easygoing approach to visualization.

episodes.name: How to Fall in Love with Life
episodes.overview: Pause for a moment of gratitude, and learn to listen to the mind. Andy explores ways to fall in love with life and introduces a reflection meditation.

episodes.name: How to Deal with Stress
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed? It often begins within. Change this relationship to anxiety and cope with stress using a simple, powerful meditation technique: noting.

episodes.name: How to be Kind
episodes.overview: Release resentment toward others — and oneself — and learn to live with greater compassion. Andy guides a loving kindness meditation.

episodes.name: How to Deal with Pain
episodes.overview: How do we experience pain? Be present without the suffering that feels unbearable, and bring the body and mind together with a body scan meditation.

episodes.name: How to Deal with Anger
episodes.overview: Transform your anger into something positive. Andy discusses how a shift in perspective can be a life-changing tool when relating to others.

episodes.name: How to Achieve Your Limitless Potential
episodes.overview: Open your mind. Andy explores why the possibilities are limitless with a consistent mindfulness practice and leads a resting awareness meditation.
